name: treatment of waste plaster-cardboard sandwich, sorting plant | waste plaster-cardboard sandwich | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/10412/documentation

The process represents the sorting of 'waste plaster-cardboard sandwich' for final disposal. The waste contains 0.834kg gypsum and 0.166kg cardboard, while its density is 1000 kg/m3. 

The activity starts with the waste being available at the gate of the treatment facility. Collection and transportation of the waste to the treatment plant is not included.

The activity includes energy for dismantling, particulate matter emissions from dismantling and handling, machines for handling in sorting plant, electricity demand for sorting plant, and final disposal of waste material.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Modelling parameters are not specific to this geography.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Building demolition with skid-steer loaders. Dry sorting plant for building wastes with pre-sorting of mixed waste, crushing and manual sorting.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography CH. The uncertainty and Production Volume (PV) has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: waste-specific calculation based on literature data
